titles.title: Break Every Chain
There is power in the name of Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power in the name of Jesus
To break every chain, break every chain
Break every chain

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All sufficient sacrifice
So freely given
such a price
bought our redemption
Heaven's gates swing wide

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's an army rising up
There's an army rising up
There's an army rising up
To break every chain, break every chain
Break every chain
